Forecast_Up_To.Description: As per IMD forecast dry weather is very likely to prevail in next two days and very light to light rain may occur on 12.02.2024 to 13.02.2024. Sky may remain partly cloudy to overcast. Wind may blow mainly from Easterly to South Easterly direction with a speed of 5 to 7 km/hr.

General Advisory.Advisory: Very light to light rain is in the forecast on coming Monday & Tuesday. Farmers are advised to withhold irrigation and spraying of chemicals for the time being.
Farmers are advised to install 'T' shaped bird perches in and around crop fields like Chickpea, Green gram, Groundnut and vegetables for controlling insect population.
Install pheromone trap @ 3-4/acre for monitoring borer insect in vegetables like brinjal, cauliflower, cabbage, tomato etc.
Rouging of viral infested plants should be done in vegetables. Infected plants should be uprooted and buried in the soil.
Install yellow sticky trap @ 8/acre to monitor sucking pest like White fly, Aphids, Jassids & Thrips in vegetative stage.
To control black spot disease in Rose spray Copper Oxy-chloride 50% WP @ 3g/ltr of water.
To control inflorescence rotting in Merigold spray Mancozeb 75% WP @ 2g by mixing with one liter of water.
Vaccinate animals against FMD, BQ, HS, PPR & Goat Pox.

Crop-Specific Advisory.Advisory: Weed Management: Apply granular herbicide Bensulfuron-methyl + Pretilachlor @ 4 kg/acre at 5-8 days after transplanting.
Nutrient Management: In direct seeded rice apply urea @ 24 kg/acre as first top dressing at 20-25 DAS.
Weed Management: Apply Imazethapyr 10% SL @ 3ml/10 ltrs of water at 15-20 DAS.
Disease & Insect Management: Install yellow sticky trap @ 8/acre to monitor at vegetative stage.
Weed Management: Apply Tembotrione 34.4% SC @ 6ml or Topramezone 33.6% SC @ 1.5g by mixing with 10 liters of water at 20-25 DAS for chemical control.
Nutrient Management: Apply 75 kg urea as first top dressing at 20-25 DAS and 45 kg Urea + 20 kg MOP as second top dressing at 40-45 DAS.
Now the crop is close to maturity stage. Harvest the head at 20% moisture of the seed.
Disease and Insect Management: Fruit & Shoot borer: Install pheromone trap @ 2nos/acre.
Disease and Insect Management: Dimond back moth: Spray Fipronil 5% SC @ 2ml/ltr.
Disease and Insect Management: Thrips: To manage thrips infestation install Blue sticky trap @ 8 nos./acre.
Insect Management: Fruit and Shoot borer: Install pheromone trap/Wata trap @ 8 nos. per acre area at vegetative stage.
